name: Zelda botw 2
description:
Today, I'm publishing one of the game I'm the most proud of, a zelda like game. 
In this game, you will incarnate link, and you have to defend hyrule against a guardian. 
Unfortunately, I didn't have time to finish coding the boss fight, so you won't be able to save hyrule just yet... But my game already contain a cool functioning puzzle that you can try to solve even if you won't get to fight the guardian. I'm busy with other project right now, but one day I'll come back and finish this tribute game that I hold dear to my heart. 

CONTROL : 

You can move around using the arrow keys. 
I had some issues with the key-binding when I uploaded my game to itch.io, so when the game ask you to press O, you should press E.

RULES : 

My game follow the basic tetris rules, you got to stack and destroy tetrominos before your stack reach the top of the screen, otherwise, you lose.  The more line you complete at once, the more points you get and the faster the pieces fall. 

CREDITS:
